high_level_goal: Homepage rewrite + Global search/replace for pricing and compliance language

inputs.description: Complete homepage overhaul with new pricing model ($7,500 base) and global compliance fixes. This is the authoritative pricing and language update.

NON_NEGOTIABLE_RULES.pricing: $7,500 base, 2-3 drones on rotation, 8 hours, scaling by teams + hours
NON_NEGOTIABLE_RULES.extra_hours: +$750/hour after 8 hours (was $600 in earlier task - USE $750)
NON_NEGOTIABLE_RULES.language: Replace ALL autonomy/AI language with 'manual operations + AI efficiency', 'operator-led, human-in-the-loop', 'AI-assisted alerting/triage/verification/reporting'
NON_NEGOTIABLE_RULES.compliance: NO BVLOS claims. Remove or label as 'not offered / future'
NON_NEGOTIABLE_RULES.safety_wording: Keep '<30s eyes-on' and '≤120s handoff' but NEVER say 'intercept' - say 'handoff to security lead'

subtasks.details: Replace: 'AI & Autonomy' → 'Manual Operations + AI Efficiency', 'Full autonomous fleet management' → 'Manual operations + AI-assisted alerting (human-in-the-loop)', 'autonomous' → 'operator-led'. Remove 'Autonomous Fleet Patrols'.

subtasks.title: Global search/replace - Misc
subtasks.details: 'Visual Observers on-site' → 'Visual observers as needed (mission-dependent)', 'Scutum Caeli' → 'SkyShield'

subtasks.title: Hero section update
subtasks.details: H1: 'Perimeter-first drone overwatch for outdoor events'. Subhead: 'We watch parking, rooftops, arrivals, and the outer perimeter—then direct your on-site security in real time.' Keep metrics with updated language.

subtasks.title: Comparison table fix
subtasks.details: Find 'AI & Autonomy' row. Change SkyShield column to: 'Manual operations + AI-assisted alerting (human-in-the-loop)'. Tethered column: 'Manual operation required'. Remove any 'Scutum Caeli' label.

subtasks.title: NEW Pricing section - Standard Event Package
subtasks.details: Replace entire pricing section with: Header 'Pricing', Primary card: 'Standard Event Package' - '$7,500' - '2–3 drones on rotation • 8-hour coverage • next-day Safety Receipt'. Included bullets: Pre-event perimeter plan + comms plan, Live overwatch + real-time alert verification, Direct handoff to security lead with exact location, Setup + teardown, Next-day Safety Receipt, FAA Part 107 pilots + insured operations + Remote ID compliant. Add-ons: 'Add hours: +$750/hour (after 8 hours)', 'Multi-day events: quoted (hours + teams)'. CTAs: 'Schedule Free Site Walk', 'Request Quote'

subtasks.details: Add 'Get Quote' link to navigation pointing to '/quote' (or 'info/quote.html'). Make it visually distinct (button style or highlighted).

All autonomy language replaced with operator-led language

notes_from_legate: THIS IS THE AUTHORITATIVE PRICING: $7,500 base for 8 hours with 2-3 drones. Extra hours +$750/hr. The previous truck-based pricing is DEPRECATED. Focus on compliance safety - sophisticated buyers will audit every claim. Remove anything that sounds like we're claiming autonomous/BVLOS capabilities we don't have.
